name: Water birds calling a Turkey a 'Chicken'
description:
I recently wrote a post titled: Who is the chicken, now? 
It was inspired by a drawing based on a scene in my book 'Hypersensitivosaurus and Cold Turkey'.

More on that here: https://peakd.com/hive-120078/@vincentnijman/who-is-the-chicken-now-on-energy-and-creativity

While working on today's piece, based on another scene in that same story, I realized this might have a similar name / theme.

Here, a group of waterbirds is challenging Cold Turkey to jump from a rock into the water. Here's a short fragment of that:

"Pawwwkkkk pawwwkkkk pawwkk pawwkk…..

Pawwwwwwlkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkkk pawkkk pawkk pawwkk pawwwkkk.....

She was rudely awakened from her daydream by a cacophony of out-of-tune bird sounds that were clearly directed toward her. It was unsettling to find out where she was, standing near the edge of a pretty high rock, above the water.

Paaaaaaaaaaaaaaawwwwwwwwwwwwwwkkkkkkkkkkkkkk pawk pawwkk pawwkk… 
Paaaaaaaaaaaaaaawwwwwwwwwwwwwwkkkkkkkkkkkkkk pawk pawwkk pawwkkk!!!! 
all the birdies down in the water, shouted, flapping their wings in unison."
